title: This place will feel like home! Studio available! 700 Sq Ft!
posting_body: ['Residences on Bedford - A place to call home!', 'Bed: Studio / Bath: 1', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 700 sq ft', 'Rent: $1804 - $2000/Month', 'Terms: 3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month, 17-Month, 18-Month', '(203) 208-3262', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Residence on Bedford is a luxury apartment complex located in Stamford, CT offering Studio, One, Two, & Three bedroom apartments.', 'We offer multiple amenities available to residents including a bowling alley, winter ice skating rink, and beautiful fitness center!', 'If you are interested in renting an apartment with us please contact our leasing office to schedule a tour today!', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '◾ Abundant Closet Space', '◾ All Units Come With Brand New Hardwood Floors!', '◾ Balcony', '◾ Blinds', '◾ Garage', '◾ Heating', '◾ Spectacular Views in Select Units', '◾ Stainless Steel appliances in Select Units', '◾ Storage Units', '◾ Updated Interior Finishes', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '◾ Bowling Alley', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Gas Grills', '◾ On-Site Park', '◾ Parks Nearby', '◾ Pet Friendly', '◾ Play Area', '◾ Pool', '◾ 48-Hour Maintenance Commitment', '◾ Beautiful Picnic Areas', '◾ Close to Shopping, Dining, and Entertainment', '◾ Elegant Clubroom', '◾ Free Wi-Fi access in Common Areas', '◾ Ice Skating Rink **', 'Winter Only', '◾ Laundry Facilities on Every Floor', '◾ Near Downtown Stamford', '◾ Online Payments Available', 'Contact Info:', '(203) 208-3262', '1425 Bedford St', 'Stamford, CT 06905', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'We charge a $500 non-refundable fee for each pet.', 'We also charge $75 for pet rent for each pet monthly.', 'Pet Types: Cats and Dogs', 'Breed restrictions apply', 'Weight Limit: 35 lbs.', 'Maximum pets per unit: 2', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A02AA03AF6A74617']
